cluster_description: Requirements for handling sensitive health information. This includes permissions, audit logs, encryption, and data review options.
Requirements ensuring health monitoring is precise and trustworthy. These include error handling, real-time feedback, and validation mechanisms for biometric readings.

Requirements ensuring older adults can dictate the timing, type, and intrusiveness of care interactions. Includes push-to-start reminders, refusal of check-ins, and conditional engagement with medical routines.
